snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral

client = SeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.headers.send(
    query="What is the weather today",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral

client = AsyncSeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.headers.send(
    query="What is the weather today",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral

client = SeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.inlined.send(
    temperature=10.1,
    prompt="You are a helpful assistant",
    stream=False,
    query="What is the weather today",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral

client = AsyncSeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.inlined.send(
    temperature=10.1,
    prompt="You are a helpful assistant",
    stream=False,
    query="What is the weather today",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral

client = SeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.path.send()
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral

client = AsyncSeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.path.send()

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral

client = SeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.query.send(
    query="What is the weather today",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral

client = AsyncSeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.query.send(
    query="What is the weather today",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed import SendRequest
from seed.client import SeedLiteral

client = SeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.reference.send(
    request=SendRequest(
        prompt="You are a helpful assistant",
        stream=False,
        query="What is the weather today",
    ),
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed import SendRequest
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral

client = AsyncSeedLiteral(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.reference.send(
    request=SendRequest(
        prompt="You are a helpful assistant",
        stream=False,
        query="What is the weather today",
    ),
)
